nodes.text: Node A: First node in the cycle
nodes.definition: First node in cyclic test graph

nodes.text: Node B: Second node in the cycle
nodes.definition: Second node in cyclic test graph

nodes.text: Node C: Third node in the cycle
nodes.definition: Third node in cyclic test graph

nodes.text: Node D: Fourth node in the cycle
nodes.definition: Fourth node in cyclic test graph

edges.conditions: A connects to B in the cycle
B connects to C in the cycle
C connects to D in the cycle
D connects back to A, completing the cycle
